wmndsMsgSummaryProps.name: type
wmndsMsgSummaryProps.description: Type of the message component. As default it is info. Available types: info, success, success-fill-no-icon, warning, error

wmndsMsgSummaryProps.name: title
wmndsMsgSummaryProps.description: Type of the button. As default it is null. Available types: link, primary, secondary, destructive, start, mode

wmndsMsgSummaryProps.name: subtitle
wmndsMsgSummaryProps.description: Type of the button. As default it is null. Available types: link, primary, secondary, destructive, start, mode

wmndsMsgSummaryProps.name: contentText
wmndsMsgSummaryProps.description: Required. The text that displays in the message component. You can use any string with this option. If you set contentHTML, this option is not required and is ignored.

wmndsMsgSummaryProps.name: contentHTML
wmndsMsgSummaryProps.description: Required. The HTML to use within the notification banner. You can use any string with this option. If you set contentHTML, contentText is not required and is ignored.

wmndsMsgSummaryProps.name: dismissable
wmndsMsgSummaryProps.description: If dismissable is set to true, the component will display a close icon.

wmndsMsgSummaryProps.name: classes
wmndsMsgSummaryProps.description: The classes that you want to add to the message component.
